title: Track a Shipment of Hard Drives
description: A production needs to track a shipment of hard drives containing raw footage being sent from a location shoot back to the studio.

tasks.description: Get the tracking number for the shipment from the location manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct tracking number.

tasks.description: Check the status of the shipment using the courier's tracking service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the shipment is currently in transit and scheduled for delivery tomorrow.

tasks.description: Notify the post-production supervisor of the estimated delivery time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear notification with the tracking details.
